articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens lower ahead of BoC rate decision; Dollarama slides - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index opened lower on Wednesday as financial stocks declined ahead of the central bank's interest rate decision, while Dollarama Inc fell due to a downbeat forecast.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX opens lower as BlackBerry falls; index heads for weekly gain - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index fell on Friday, with BlackBerry Ltd leading declines following quarterly results, but the index was set for weekly gains.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
June 25 (Reuters) - Canadas main stock index fell on Friday, with BlackBerry Ltd leading declines following quarterly results, but the index was set for weekly gains.

articles.title: CANADA STOCKS-Energy stocks lift TSX as oil prices rise - Reuters
articles.description: Canada's main stock index rose on Thursday on the back of higher oil prices, a day after the central bank left its key interest rate unchanged.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
June 10 (Reuters) - Canadas main stock index rose on Thursday on the back of higher oil prices, a day after the central bank left its key interest rate unchanged.

articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Figure skating-Montreal awarded 2024 world championships - Reuters
articles.description: Montreal will host the 2024 world figure skating championships, the International Skating Union (ISU) said on Wednesday, after the 2020 event Canada was to host was cancelled due to COVID-19.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff

articles.title: Citigroup names new sales head for Treasury and Trade Solutions unit - Reuters
articles.description: Citigroup Inc has named Steve Elms as the new sales head for the bank's Treasury and Trade Solutions (TTS) unit effective immediately, according to an internal memo shared by a company spokesperson.

By Reuters Staff
